reviewText: I thought I was getting a video about St Saens and it was a poorly done video on animals and even the music wasn't good. Huge disappointment. I would have sent it back but I had opened it.

I got this video used and we really liked it. It has "Radar", from Mash, (can't think of name), reciting poetry about different animals, great classical music, with the musicians shown playing their instruments and great footage of animals in the zoo, dinosaur bones in a museum, etc. Lots of real footage of kids and adults and animals. I'd recommend this.
This book is great for all you animal lovers out there! It will give indepth information about you furry loved one! I stongly reccomend this book!
